title: Man is a builder
brief_description: Illustrates the important place held by the building industry in modern Britain, and the increasing demands being made for its service. Describes the men at craft, supervisory and executive levels, who are fulfilling the demands. Shows the training and skills they need, and some of the machines and methods they use.
